titleStmt.title: A declaration to all His Majesties loving subjects within the Kingdome of England and dominion of Wales; concerning a King and his representative councell, touching the government of his people, according to the known laws of the realme. With the opinion and proceedings of seven ambassadours concerning the governement of the common-wealth.
titleStmt.author: G. N.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
